publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-375 Jamie McGrigor: Congratulations to Inverary and District Pipe Bandâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the members of the Inverary and District Pipe Band on winning the World Championship at the World Pipe Band Championships in Glasgow; notes that this success comes on top of winning the Scottish and British championships; further notes that this success comes only in the second year of competing in the world championship, and pays tribute to all the participants and coaches and wishes all those involved in the pipe band continued success in the future. Supported by: Jackson Carlaw*, Ted Brocklebank*, Murdo Fraser*, Stuart McMillan*, Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Mary Scanlon*, Jim Hume*, Alex Johnstone*, Jackie Baillie*, Robin Harper*, John Lamont*, Margaret Mitchell*, Karen Gillon*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-375 Congratulations to Inverary and District Pipe Band (lodged on 20 August 2007) Jamie Stone*, Annabel Goldie*
S3M-375 Congratulations to Inverary and District Pipe Band (lodged on 20 August 2007) Derek Brownlee*
S3M-375 Congratulations to Inverary and District Pipe Band (lodged on 20 August 2007) Jack McConnell*
